Because the dataset is unbalanced between years 0 and 1 two possible approaches to improve the general score are Enlarge the dataset to additional years. Apply an over sampling method to year 0 on the cnt feature like SMOTE Synthetic Minority Oversampling Technique prior to fitting the data to the regressor models.
